name: FUN_SGD_POST_TRANS_ISSUE_MT
body_snippet:
function Fun_sgd_post_trans_issue_mt return number is
   lnm_Iss_Trans_Id number;
  lnm_ISS_TRANS_DET_ID number;
begin

for c in (select m.inv_book_id,
       m.remarks,
       m.trans_date,
       m.to_sub_inv,
       m.ref_no,m.Trans_No from temp_TRANS_ISSUE_mt m)loop

  lnm_Iss_Trans_Id := get_single_primary_key('TRANS_ISSUE_mt','Iss_Trans_Id');

       insert into TRANS_ISSUE_mt(Iss_Trans_Id,
                                  Inv_Book_Id,
                                  Trans_No,
                                  Remarks,
                                  Trans_Date,
                                  Auto_Receipt_Yn,
                                  To_Sub_Inv,
                                  Inv_Transaction_No,
                                  Ref_No,
                                  Authorized_Yn,
                                  Send_For_Auth,
                                  Auth_Id,
                                  Auth_Status_Id,
                                  Journal_Id,
                                  Post_To_Gl)Values
                                  (
                                  lnm_Iss_Trans_Id,--Iss_Trans_Id,
                                  c.Inv_Book_Id,
                               c.Trans_No,
                                  c.Remarks,
                                  c.Trans_Date,
                                 0,-- Auto_Receipt_Yn,
                                  c.To_Sub_Inv,
                                  null,--Inv_Tr
